edu.harvard.hul.ois.mets.helper
Class MetsWriter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.harvard.hul.ois.mets.helper.MetsWriter
public class MetsWriter
extends java.lang.Object

Writer to serialize an in-memory representation of a METS document to a file.
